#summary JTV TV program format is mostly used in exUSSR countries.
#labels Featured,Phase-Implementation

= Introduction =

JTV requires 2 separate files for each channel: 
 # *.pdt*
 # *.ndx*

1. .pdt file always starts with string "JTV 3.x TV Program Data" followed by 3 bytes with hex values A0. Then goes 2 bytes program name length and program name itself (encoding is unknown, Cyrillic uses win-1251)
